about_the_game:
Hello, Welcome to the page of The Discrete Era.
Currently, this game is still under developing. The release date is estimated to be first half of 2024.

When the fog rise up and cover on the world, the rest of us becomes survivors.
And the ones who has courage, forming the Misty Scout, and try to seek for the truth behide this disaster. They sail above cloud, went between ruins and wasterland, and try to find a reason for the death of their relatives.

This is a action rogue-like game. In this game you can play by single-player, or coop with other players. You will go to ruins in fog, fight with monsters. Get runes and relics, refine your weapon, and defeat the boss of this world.

We also planned to have a small PVP mode in the future, for some extra fun~

Meanwhile, after the Magic Battle Cry, this game can also use voice input to cast spells, but it is not required. If you cannot, or will not to use voice input, you can have complete game experience by using the "fast casting slots" in game. On the other hand, if you want use mic input, you need not to worry about the "fast casting slots", and you can use your memory to cast the massive amount of spells.

Hope you can get fun in this game, and we will meet in 2024~
